basics.name: Justin Time
basics.label: Assistant to the Traveling Secretary | Import/Export Visionary
basics.summary: Resourceful operations professional with extensive experience navigating high-pressure front-office environments, baseball administration, and startup import/export ventures. Known for creative problem-solving, persuasive communication, and delivering results with limited preparation time.

work.name: New York City Arcade League
work.summary: Competed in regional arcade tournaments with a specialization in high-pressure Frogger strategy and score optimization.
highlights: Achieved top-5 finish in three consecutive citywide Frogger invitationals
Developed repeatable risk-timing techniques for high-traffic crossing patterns
Mentored new competitors on focus, pacing, and joystick ergonomics

work.name: New York Yankees
work.summary: Supported team travel logistics, front-office coordination, and executive communications in a fast-paced professional sports environment.
highlights: Coordinated travel schedules, accommodations, and itineraries for team personnel under tight deadlines
Prepared briefing materials and handled time-sensitive requests for senior leadership
Improved office response times by introducing practical tracking checklists

work.name: Play Now, Inc.
work.summary: Represented product lines in commercial and print campaigns requiring detailed hand-feature presentation.
highlights: Maintained strict grooming and appearance standards for close-up production work
Collaborated with creative directors and production teams to meet campaign requirements
Delivered on tight shoot timelines with minimal retakes

work.name: Vandelay Industries
work.summary: Launched and operated a boutique import/export concept focused on market positioning and strategic supplier conversations.
highlights: Developed brand narrative and sales messaging for prospective customers and partners
Negotiated preliminary supplier terms across domestic and international channels
Built flexible operating plans adaptable to changing market conditions

work.name: Kruger Industrial Smoothing
work.summary: Handled ad hoc initiatives, executive follow-ups, and cross-department coordination for a lean operations team.
highlights: Created practical project trackers that improved follow-through on recurring requests
Streamlined meeting preparation by introducing reusable briefing templates
Supported client-facing visits and maintained smooth on-site logistics

work.name: Monk's Caf√©
work.position: Frequent Patron and Informal Strategy Consultant
work.summary: Advised peers on life logistics, networking opportunities, and spontaneous problem-solving over coffee.
highlights: Facilitated dozens of impromptu planning sessions with actionable next steps
Built strong neighborhood relationships through consistent face-to-face communication
Applied creative thinking to unusual everyday challenges

volunteer.summary: Supported neighborhood events and local fundraising activities.
highlights: Organized event seating, guest check-in, and on-site coordination

education.institution: Queens College, City University of New York

awards.title: Employee of the Month (Honorable Mention)
awards.summary: Recognized for reliability and responsiveness during an intensive travel cycle.

publications.name: The Art of Looking Busy
publications.summary: A humorous editorial on office optics, timing, and workplace perception.

references.name: Available upon request
references.reference: Professional references can be provided after initial screening.

projects.name: Import/Export Launch Plan
projects.description: Developed a practical go-to-market plan for a startup import/export venture with phased partner outreach.
highlights: Defined initial supplier categories and outreach scripts
Prepared early-stage budget and timeline scenarios
